title: I have purchased Google pixel 2 mobile phone on 15th Feb 2018, and I was very happy to know the features. Recently my some water fell on my mobile phone and the screen got damaged. I knew that it's water resistance but to my surprise it got damaged by slightest water fell. Which I didn't expected from Company like Google. So I want an explanation why this happened and getting it done without any charges. Expected early response. Thanks.
